about_the_game: Slip into the metal shoes of a young, smart robot named Robort. One day, as you are walking to your grandpa’s house, you witness his kidnapping. His garage is left thrashed, his inventions are broken, and all you have is a radio station connecting you to Grandpa. Who did this? What do they want? You must solve this mystery full of brain-scratching riddles, powerful enemies, and unusual worlds.

short_description: Tiny Robots Portal Escape is an exciting puzzle escape game set in a robot world full of curious characters, colourful levels, and exotic alternative realities. Collect items, look for hidden clues, and solve tricky puzzles. Oh, and don’t forget to save your grandpa from the bad guys!
